question: You work for an international company. You have seen an advertisement for a training course which will be useful for your job.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter•	describe the training course you want to do•	explain what the company could do to help you•	say how the course will be useful for your job
text: I am writing this letter in connection with the possibility to take the advertised Data Analysis course.

Let me start by outlining the aims of the course, which is to teach how to manipulate a large amount of data, as well as to retrieve valuable information from it. It is mentioned that at the end of the lessons you will have the skills to use data in order to provide support to decision-making regarding many issues.

With regards to the company’s action, to attend the program it is necessary two reference letters from managers or superiors. The letter should point out the reasons why the course would be useful for the one who is taken and the agreement of the company in this matter.

Finally, I would like to highlight the reasons why the training will be of great value for me, which is due to the possibility of getting a better internal position. Considering that many Data Analyst positions are being opened, I would like to prepare myself in order to be competitive and apply for such a job opportunity.
I am looking forward to your response at your earliest convenience.
